alert.note: Alert for Burleigh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:16PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL KIDDER AND EAST CENTRAL BURLEIGH COUNTIES... At 615 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Steele, or 42 miles east of Bismarck, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lake Isabel around 620 PM CDT. Dawson around 625 PM CDT. Tappen around 630 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Interstate 94 and Horsehead Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
